languages.text: "Императив почтения парализовал вашу волю, и в тишине вы наблюдали, как вершится трагедия. Шестой Универсальный закон гласит, что Понимание есть Истинный Путь к Познанию. Но процедурный Цикл лишил вас Понимания. И потому — да будет прерван Цикл".

"The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."
languages.original_text: "Императив почтения парализовал вашу волю, и в тишине вы наблюдали, как вершится трагедия. Шестой Универсальный закон гласит, что Понимание есть Истинный Путь к Познанию. Но процедурный Цикл лишил вас Понимания. И потому — да будет прерван Цикл".

Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

languages.text: 「断固とした崇敬があなたの意志を麻痺させた。そして悲劇が目の前で展開するのをあなたは黙って見ていた。6の宇宙法は、理解は知識への真の道であると述べている。しかし手順サイクルがあなたから理解を奪った。故に…サイクルを断ち切れ」
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: 「断固とした崇敬があなたの意志を麻痺させた。そして悲劇が目の前で展開するのをあなたは黙って見ていた。6の宇宙法は、理解は知識への真の道であると述べている。しかし手順サイクルがあなたから理解を奪った。故に…サイクルを断ち切れ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “敬畏麻痹了你的意志，你眼睁睁地看着这场悲剧发生。普适准则第六条指出，理解是通往知识的真正道路。然而，程序性的循环却剥夺了你的理解能力。因此，让循环终止吧。”
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: “敬畏麻痹了你的意志，你眼睁睁地看着这场悲剧发生。普适准则第六条指出，理解是通往知识的真正道路。然而，程序性的循环却剥夺了你的理解能力。因此，让循环终止吧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Imperativ der Ehrfurcht hatte Euren Willen gelähmt, und Ihr saht schweigend einer Tragödie zu. Das sechste Universalgesetz besagt, dass Verständnis der wahre Pfad zum Wissen ist. Doch der prozedurale Zyklus hat Euch Euer Verständnis genommen. Darum sollte der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werden."
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperativ der Ehrfurcht hatte Euren Willen gelähmt, und Ihr saht schweigend einer Tragödie zu. Das sechste Universalgesetz besagt, dass Verständnis der wahre Pfad zum Wissen ist. Doch der prozedurale Zyklus hat Euch Euer Verständnis genommen. Darum sollte der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'impératif de révérence a paralysé votre jugement et vous avez assisté à une tragédie sans réagir. La sixième Loi Universelle stipule que la compréhension est la seule voie menant à la connaissance. Cependant, la procédure en vigueur vous a privé de vos capacités d'entendement, raison pour laquelle le cycle doit être interrompu. »
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: « L'impératif de révérence a paralysé votre jugement et vous avez assisté à une tragédie sans réagir. La sixième Loi Universelle stipule que la compréhension est la seule voie menant à la connaissance. Cependant, la procédure en vigueur vous a privé de vos capacités d'entendement, raison pour laquelle le cycle doit être interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El imperativo de reverencia había paralizado vuestra voluntad, y presenciasteis el trágico desenlace en silencio. La Sexta Ley Universal dictamina que la comprensión es el verdadero camino al conocimiento. Pero el Ciclo procedimental os ha despojado de vuestra comprensión. Por lo tanto, que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: «El imperativo de reverencia había paralizado vuestra voluntad, y presenciasteis el trágico desenlace en silencio. La Sexta Ley Universal dictamina que la comprensión es el verdadero camino al conocimiento. Pero el Ciclo procedimental os ha despojado de vuestra comprensión. Por lo tanto, que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Saygı duyma mecburiyetin, iradeni felce uğrattı. Bir trajedi gerçekleşirken sessizce izledin. Altıncı Evrensel Yasa, İdrakin İrfana giden Gerçek Yol olduğunu belirtir. Buna rağmen sana yöntemler direten Döngü, İdrakini senden söküp aldı. Bundandır ki... Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
languages.original_text: "The imperative of reverence had paralysed your will, and you watched a tragedy unfold in silence. The Sixth Universal Law states that Comprehension is the True Path to Knowledge. Yet the procedural Cycle has robbed you of your Comprehension. Therefore — let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: "Saygı duyma mecburiyetin, iradeni felce uğrattı ve bir trajedi gerçekleşirken sessizce izledin. Altıncı Evrensel Yasa, İdrakin İrfana giden Gerçek Yol olduğunu belirtir. Buna rağmen sana yöntemler direten Döngü, İdrakini senden söküp aldı. Dolayısıyla: Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
